title: 旧约 - 约伯记(Job) - 第 8 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 约伯记(Job) -- 第 8 章 ( 本篇共有 42 章 )

lineList.en: Then answered Bildad the Shuhite, and said,
lineList.cn: 书亚人比勒达回答说，

lineList.en: How long wilt thou speak these things? and how long shall the words of thy mouth be like a strong wind?
lineList.cn: 这些话你要说到几时。口中的言语如狂风要到几时呢。

lineList.en: Doth God pervert judgment? or doth the Almighty pervert justice?
lineList.cn: 神岂能偏离公平。全能者岂能偏离公义。

lineList.en: If thy children have sinned against him, and he have cast them away for their transgression;
lineList.cn: 或者你的儿女得罪了他，他使他们受报应。

lineList.en: If thou wouldest seek unto God betimes, and make thy supplication to the Almighty;
lineList.cn: 你若殷勤地寻求神，向全能者恳求。

lineList.en: If thou wert pure and upright; surely now he would awake for thee, and make the habitation of thy righteousness prosperous.
lineList.cn: 你若清洁正直，他必定为你起来，使你公义的居所兴旺。

lineList.en: Though thy beginning was small, yet thy latter end should greatly increase.
lineList.cn: 你起初虽然微小，终久必甚发达。

lineList.en: For enquire, I pray thee, of the former age, and prepare thyself to the search of their fathers:
lineList.cn: 请你考问前代，追念他们的列祖所查究的。

lineList.en: (For we are but of yesterday, and know nothing, because our days upon earth are a shadow:)
lineList.cn: 我们不过从昨日才有，一无所知。我们在世的日子好像影儿。

lineList.en: Shall not they teach thee, and tell thee, and utter words out of their heart?
lineList.cn: 他们岂不指教你，告诉你，从心里发出言语来呢。

lineList.en: Can the rush grow up without mire? can the flag grow without water?
lineList.cn: 蒲草没有泥，岂能发长。芦荻没有水，岂能生发。

lineList.en: Whilst it is yet in his greenness, and not cut down, it withereth before any other herb.
lineList.cn: 尚青的时候，还没有割下，比百样的草先枯槁。

lineList.en: So are the paths of all that forget God; and the hypocrite's hope shall perish:
lineList.cn: 凡忘记神的人，景况也是这样。不虔敬人的指望要灭没。

lineList.en: Whose hope shall be cut off, and whose trust shall be a spider's web.
lineList.cn: 他所仰赖的必折断，他所倚靠的是蜘蛛网。

lineList.en: He shall lean upon his house, but it shall not stand: he shall hold it fast, but it shall not endure.
lineList.cn: 他要倚靠房屋，房屋却站立不住。他要抓住房屋，房屋却不能存留。

lineList.en: He is green before the sun, and his branch shooteth forth in his garden.
lineList.cn: 他在日光之下发青，蔓子爬满了园子。

lineList.en: His roots are wrapped about the heap, and seeth the place of stones.
lineList.cn: 他的根盘绕石堆，扎入石地。

lineList.en: If he destroy him from his place, then it shall deny him, saying, I have not seen thee.
lineList.cn: 他若从本地被拔出，那地就不认识他，说，我没有见过你。

lineList.en: Behold, this is the joy of his way, and out of the earth shall others grow.
lineList.cn: 看哪，这就是他道中之乐。以后必另有人从地而生。

lineList.en: Behold, God will not cast away a perfect man, neither will he help the evil doers:
lineList.cn: 神必不丢弃完全人，也不扶助邪恶人。

lineList.en: Till he fill thy mouth with laughing, and thy lips with rejoicing.
lineList.cn: 他还要以喜乐充满你的口，以欢呼充满你的嘴。

lineList.en: They that hate thee shall be clothed with shame; and the dwelling place of the wicked shall come to nought.
lineList.cn: 恨恶你的要披戴惭愧。恶人的帐棚，必归无有。
